holidays.title: Safer Internet Day
holidays.description: It's extraordinary to have an infinite amount of access to information at your fingertips!

holidays.title: Angola Carnival Day
holidays.description: Color your world with a splash of Africa! It's Angola Carnival Day.

holidays.title: Black Love Day
holidays.description: Black Love Day is about spreading love and promoting peace in our society.

holidays.title: Brazilian Carninval
holidays.description: Brazilian Carnival is marked by colorful costumes, samba music and dance, grand parades, and food festivals.

holidays.title: Canada's Agriculture Day
holidays.description: Grab your forks as we celebrate the foods we love and the farmers who produce them!

holidays.title: Desperation Day
holidays.description: Join us as we get into exactly what Desperation Day is all about!

holidays.title: Dream Your Sweet Day
holidays.description: The night before Valentine's Day is the best time to dream about your sweetheart.

holidays.title: Ecuador Carnival
holidays.description: The Ecuador Carnival is a popular celebration that takes its origins from the remembrance of Jesus.

holidays.title: Employee Legal Awareness Day
holidays.description: It’s time to learn more about your legal rights as an employee.

holidays.title: Extraterrestrial Culture Day
holidays.description: Have you ever wondered about the lives that may exist in other galaxies?

holidays.title: Fasnacht Day
holidays.description: We encourage you to enjoy fluffy fried pastry on Fasnacht Day! If not now, when?

holidays.title: Get a Different Name Day
holidays.description: This is a day when the famous adage “What’s in a name?” matters.

holidays.title: International Condom Day
holidays.description: Check the expiration date on your condom box and get ready for this day!

holidays.title: International Natural Day
holidays.description: Bask in self-love without any guilt, knowing that you deserve it fully.

holidays.title: Kiss Day
holidays.description: Find your worries and anxieties melting away when you tenderly kiss your sweetheart.

holidays.title: Mardi Gras
holidays.description: It's Mardi Gras time, arguably one the best celebrations in the world.

holidays.title: National Apology Day
holidays.description: A day to commemorate the public presentation of a national apology to the Australian Indigenous peoples!

holidays.title: National Break Up With Your Carrier Day
holidays.description: Today’s all about getting good mobile service and giving the boot to bad mobile network providers.

holidays.title: National Cheddar Day
holidays.description: Bite into the dairy delight of cheddar as we celebrate this cheesy day.

holidays.title: National Crab Rangoon Day
holidays.description: We’re dishing out crab rangoon and hanging out with friends on this special holiday!

holidays.title: National Derrick Day
holidays.description: Prepare to celebrate one of the most distinctive names in the world.

holidays.title: National Internet Friends Day
holidays.description: Get ready to celebrate the greatness of internet friendships with our tips!

holidays.title: National Jamie Day
holidays.description: Get together to celebrate and appreciate all the Jamies around the globe.

holidays.title: National Tortellini Day
holidays.description: Whether you enjoy them with butter and sage or parmesan, lift a fork to celebrate!

holidays.title: National Wingman Day
holidays.description: Gather your mates and get ready to celebrate this day! Here’s everything you need to know!

holidays.title: Qatar Sports Day
holidays.description: Qatar encourages all citizens to get fit by recognizing National Sports Day.

holidays.title: Self-Love Day
holidays.description: This Self-Love Day, join us in celebrating the amazing power of self-love.

holidays.title: Travel Africa Day
holidays.description: Africa has its mysteries. Join us as we unravel them on Travel Africa Day!

holidays.title: World Radio Day
holidays.description: Celebrate and find out how radio is still changing lives across the globe.

holidays.title: Jess Hilarious’s Birthday
holidays.description: This talented comedian has captured the attention of thousands with her witty humor.

holidays.title: Sockie Norris’s Birthday
holidays.description: She’s a young star who has found success by just having fun with her family!
